channel.title: eSIM Myanmar Entertainment Server
channel.description: ESIM MYANMAR COMPANY LIMITED - Enterprise eSIM Management Platform - MPT, ATOM, U9, MYTEL eSIM activation and management

item.title: eSIM Registration Now Available - MPT, ATOM, U9, MYTEL
item.description: Register your eSIM with any of our 4 providers: MPT, ATOM, U9, or MYTEL. 120,000 MMK activation fee with instant QR code delivery.

item.title: 5G and VoLTE Support Across All Providers
item.description: All eSIM plans now include 5G and VoLTE support for crystal-clear calls and ultra-fast data speeds.

item.title: Nexora AI Assistant - Ask AI for eSIM Support
item.description: Get instant answers about eSIM activation, pricing, device compatibility, and more with our AI-powered assistant.

item.title: Holiday Season 2025-2026 Special Theme
item.description: Celebrate the holidays with our festive theme featuring animated Santa guide and countdown to 2026.
